Definition: In this task, you are given a text. If the text is about a person, output "Yes". Otherwise, output "No".

Positive Examples.input: Text:  The third and current HMS Argyll is a Type 23 'Duke' Class frigate. She is currently the oldest serving Type 23 frigate in the Royal Navy. Like all of her class she is named for a British dukedom in this case that of Argyll.
Positive Examples.explanation: HMS Argyll is a frigate which a warship. Clearly the text is not about a person. Hence, the answer is No.

Positive Examples.input: Text: Alison Bechdel (/ˈbɛkdəl/ BEK-dəl; born September 10 1960) is an American cartoonist. Originally best known for the long-running comic strip Dykes to Watch Out For she came to critical and commercial success in 2006 with her graphic memoir Fun Home.
Positive Examples.explanation: Alison Bechdel is an American cartoonist. Clearly the text is about a person. The answer should be Yes.

Negative Examples.input: Text:  The third and current HMS Argyll is a Type 23 'Duke' Class frigate. She is currently the oldest serving Type 23 frigate in the Royal Navy. Like all of her class she is named for a British dukedom in this case that of Argyll.
Negative Examples.explanation: HMS Argyll is a frigate which a warship. Clearly the text is not about a person. Hence, it is an incorrect answer and a negative example.

Negative Examples.input: Text: Alison Bechdel (/ˈbɛkdəl/ BEK-dəl; born September 10 1960) is an American cartoonist. Originally best known for the long-running comic strip Dykes to Watch Out For she came to critical and commercial success in 2006 with her graphic memoir Fun Home.
Negative Examples.explanation: The output is neither "Yes" nor "No". Hence, it is an incorrect answer and a negative example.

Instances.input: Text:  Zenón Noriega Agüero (July 12 1900 – May 7 1957) was a Peruvian army general who formally was president of a military Junta for two months in 1950.

Text:  Peter Henry Goldsmith Baron Goldsmith PC QC (born 5 January 1950) is a former Attorney General for England and Wales and Northern Ireland. On 22 June 2007 Goldsmith announced his resignation which took effect on 27 June 2007 the same day that prime minister Tony Blair stepped down. Goldsmith was the longest serving Labour Attorney General. He currently works for US law firm Debevoise & Plimpton as head of its European litigation practice.

Text:  Tuscarora Creek is a 7.7-mile-long (12.4 km) tributary of the Monocacy River in Frederick County Maryland in the United States.The creek rises at the eastern base of Catoctin Mountain about 6.5 miles (10.5 km) north-northwest of the city of Frederick and flows southeast about to its mouth at the Monocacy. The creek's watershed area is 15.28 square miles (39.6 km2).

Text:  John David Dungs served as Military Administrator of Delta State from August 1996 until August 1998 during the military regime of General Sani Abacha.In August 1990 Lieutenant Colonel Dungs was a member of the multinational force in Liberia when a gunboat was seized capturing 27 rebels.Warri in Delta State is the location of an oil refinery petrochemical plant and deep-water river port.
Text:  Betty Faire was a British actress of the silent era.

Text:  Paul Agricole Génin (Avignon 14 February 1832 - Paris 22 December 1903) was a French flautist and composer for flute. He was a student of Louis Dorus and became first flute at the Théâtre-Italien (Comédie-Italienne) Paris.He is sometime confused with Pierre Génin another flautist who emigrated to England.

Text:  Specimen Products is a Chicago-based manufacturer of custom guitars tube amplifiers and audio horn speakers led by luthier Ian Schneller. Specimen Products also offers courses in guitar and tube amplifier design construction and repair through their Chicago School of Guitar Making. The Specimen workshop offers repair services to the general public making use of their collection of parts from rare and vintage manufacturers.

Text:  Wayne Watson (born October 5 1954) is a Dove Award-winning singer-songwriter in contemporary Christian music. Some of his songs have become CCM classics including Another Time Another Place For Such a Time as This Friend of a Wounded Heart Touch of the Master's Hand New Lives for Old and Watercolour Ponies.
